offer_details_1:
Offer: 10% Savings on the Total Bill at Laugfs Super for bills over Rs. 5,000/- with DFCC Credit Cards.
Offer Period: Every Tuesday from 03rd to 31st December 2024
Maximum Discount Value: Rs. 1,500/-
Minimum Bill Value: Rs 5,000/-
Maximum Quantity: 3kg/ 3 units each from the categories of milk powder, rice, sugar, dhal & flour.
Other Products: Maximum quantity of 3kg/ 3 units per item.
Validity: Valid only for 01 transaction per cardholder per day.
Exempted Items: Liquor, tobacco, pharmaceuticals, existing discounted products, gift vouchers, hampers, gas purchases & utility bill payments.
Eligible Card Categories: All DFCC Credit Cards (excluding DFCC Corporate Credit Cards)
discount: 10% Savings on the Total Bill at Laugfs Super for bills over Rs. 5,000/- with DFCC Credit Cards.
